description: Students are required to complete a mini project in their chosen field of study before the end of the third semester. Students will be encouraged to select a suitable project topic upon enrolling and to continuously consider their topic throughout the program, adding value from the different courses they undertake.
incompatible: ENGY7112 or ENGY7113 or ENGY7114 or ENGY7115 or ENGY7116
restricted: Restricted to Master of Sustainable Energy students.
